name: Azameo
author: Azameo

sections.description:
Create Retargeting Ads in minutes and turn lost visitors into buyers with the Azameo Ad platform.
* Connect your site in 1 click
* Create static and dynamic ads in minutes
* Run ads on Facebook, Google and thousands of websites worldwide
* Bring back lost customers to get more sales and conversions
* NEW: Run Google Search and Shopping Ads in minutes to boost your site traffic and conversions

Azameo product retargeting for Woocommerce

Azameo will automatically manage you product catalog to create Dynamic Product and Shopping Ads that contain the products and services that are most likely to convert on your site

About the Plugin

The official Azameo plugin integrates the Azameo tracking code across your WordPress site so you can get started without editing a single line of code.

Try it for free now

To create a free Azameo retargeting campaign for your business, head to our platform. It takes just minutes to sign up.

Use the following code to get 75 Euros worth free ad credits when you buy for 25 Euros: AZAWELCOME

How does it work?

  • Install this plugin
  • When someone visits your website, we place an anonymous tracker so we can show him Retargeting Ads later across our ad network of thousands of websites worldwide.
  • Create and run Retargeting ads in minutes using our platform.

Learn more

To know more about Azameo ad platform and create your free account, please check out our website
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/AZAFLASH-retargeting directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the ‘Azameo’ screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Q. How is Azameo different from other retargeting solutions?

A. Azameo is tailored for SMBs, B2Bs and ecommerce. Unlike most retargeting solutions aiming only at high-traffic websites, Azameo keeps it simple and efficient. We handle all the ‘heavy lifting’ of re-displaying your promotional content to the right audience at the right time. No minimum traffic. No setup fee. No duration commitment.

Q. Can I try it for Free?

A. Yes, this plugin is free.

short_description: Azameo is the easiest way to run Retargeting Ads for your Wordpress site or WooCommerce store.
